General.Name: AHT Syngas Technology NV
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: AHT Syngas Technology N.V. engages in constructs biomass power plants worldwide. The company offers process design; plant engineering; project management; decentralized power plants; and clean gas and hot gas producing plants. It serves off-/micro-/parallel grids, island solutions, small/medium municipalities, communities, public buildings, large agricultural enterprises, hospitals, hotels, independent power producers, and biogas plant operators. The company was formerly known as Squeezy Sports Nutrition N.V. and changed its name to AHT Syngas Technology N.V. in May 2014. AHT Syngas Technology N.V. was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Overath, Germany.
